title: Litro officials summoned to COPE over gas crisis
body_lines: The management of Litro Gas Lanka Ltd was summoned before the Committee on Public Enterprises (COPE) this morning to inquire into the current gas shortage and related solutions.

While expressing views in Parliament yesterday on the need to expedite the gas distribution process, Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe had instructed to summon the Litro Gas officials before the COPE to look into the matter.
